import React from 'react' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { SearchBar } from '../components/SearchBar' function BookListingInformation() { const location = useLocation(); return (
{location.state.Title} {/* Shawn */} {location.state.Price === 0 ? "Free" : null} {location.state.Price > 0 ? "$" + location.state.Price : null}

Used

{location.state.LocationID}

Description

{location.state.Description}

 ); } export default BookListingInformation;
